ssot__AuthorizationForm__dlm.name: Authorization Form
ssot__AuthorizationForm__dlm.description: The Authorization Form DMO represents a set of terms and conditions, such as a privacy policy, a contract, or consent forms.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Authorization Form DMO.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__DetailsURL__c.description: A URL link with details about terms and conditions.

ssot__EffectiveFromDate__c.description: The date when consent form is in effect.

ssot__EffectiveToDate__c.description: The date when consent form is no longer in effect.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the data record.

ssot__RevisionNumber__c.description: A free text field to store a revision number for consent form, for example "rev1.21".

ssot__SummaryText__c.description: A summary of consent form content.
